resources.string: Wear your love of JSR-201 proudly with this #enumsmatter shirt.\n\nA topic that will likely confuse your grandma and raise the blood pressure of Android Developer Advocates everywhere.
Fragnums is an enum based library to replace fragments.\n\n Take your enums to the next level and write enums that matter! MVP is dead, long live MVE: Model, View, Enum.

A long time ago in a galaxy far, far awayâ€¦


Developers of the Android Framework refrained from using enums, because of their impact on the runtime and the SDK size. When you write code shared by thousands of apps and running all day long on millions of devices in an event loop, you better squeeze all the performance bits you can.

 For mysterious reasons, a few jokesters started advocating that app developers follow the same logic. We got 99 perf problems but enums ain't one. As a reaction, the community created the #enumsmatter hashtag to remind ourselves that it's OK to write sane code.
